originalText.text: My family and I used Ryan Walsh's law firm for a purchase. Ryan is simply amazing to say the least. From my initial inquiry to closing the firm was great. Ryan is very responsive. My initial inquiry was late a Saturday night and he called me back first thing Sunday morning. We had a few setbacks and Ryan was helpful throughout those as well. The firm was in constant communication with me. It was truly a great experience. This will be my go to firm for life! Thanks again for everything Ryan and the entire team!!!!

text.text: My family and I used Ryan Walsh's law firm for a purchase. Ryan is simply amazing to say the least. From my initial inquiry to closing the firm was great. Ryan is very responsive. originalText.text: I have known and worked with Samuel (Sam) for several years and it is my pleasure to recommend him to any clients and real estate professionals. He has guided my real estate clients and agents in a very professional and personal manner. He has also been a first call for legal advice for myself and my agents. His commitment to the law and the community are beyond reproach!  I can easily say that Sam is among the most dedicated, talented, honest, and ethical advocates I have encountered. I recommend him enthusiastically and without reservation.

originalText.text:
My Aunt and Uncle want to thank you very much Ryan and Albert, for a super smooth well-done house closings!!
You made it look so easy and you are so organized...!!
We will be recommending your expertise, to our Family and friends.. !!
Bravo Ryan & Albert !!
God Bless!!
M & H.

originalText.text:
Ryan and Sam have been very good to me. I need a real estate lawyer that will be protect me and I am very happy, the contracts that I’ve done with them they made sure I was fully protected. My brother and several other people I know use them as well.

Yaakov

originalText.text:
I recently worked with Ryan to close out a condo which i bought in Queens NY. I was a first time buyer so I did not had much of knowledge on the buying process.
He had a great patience to listen to all my queries and respond them accordingly, there was a time during contract signing process where he went through all the clauses one at a time and explained them thoroughly. I remember asking him many question but he never got annoyed.
Always reverted back to my emails in timely manner and special shout out to Albert Hakimi (one of his staff) who helped with closing when corona virus was at its peak in city and the lender had to shut down their branches, Al went extra mile and made the closing possible on same day, thanks buddy. Great team work.
